name: ColorSource
description: ColorSource (CS) is a series of DMX consoles by ETC.
The installed fixture library is not available in a readable format,
but custom fixtures created using the Personality Editor are saved as JSON files.
You can download the ColorSource Offline program that simulates the console if you
don't have physical access to one; see Downloads below.
fixtureUsage: Load the userlib.jlib onto the root of a USB drive and plug it into the console
(or into your computer, if you use ColorSource Offline).
When patching devices, select "User Library" instead of "Standard Library".
additionalInfo: "Beam" â€“ basically everything that doesn't fit to another type
Red, Green, Blue, White (~7500K or unknown temperature), Amber, UV,
Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Indigo, Lime, Orange, RedOrange, MintGreen, GreenCyan,
Features not supported by the Personality Editor
Range tables provide a way of defining switching channels. They aren't supported in .jlib files yet and are preserved for internal fixtures only.
